properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.x-agent-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for agent identifier.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-language-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user language.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-ip-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user IP (e.g. X-Forwarded-For).

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-id-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user ID.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-role-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user role.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.grpc-header-keys.user-global-id-key
properties.description: gRPC metadata key for user global ID.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.reactor-context-keys.user-key
properties.description: Reactor context key for current user.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.data-providers
properties.description: Map of named context data provider configurations.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.data-providers.*.enabled
properties.description: Whether this context data provider is enabled.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.context.data-providers.*.is-user-provider
properties.description: Whether this provider supplies user context (used as the user context source when enabled).

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.enabled
properties.description: Whether gRPC consumer auto-configuration is enabled.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.provide-default-channels
properties.description: Whether to provide default channel beans from configured channels.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.configure-channels
properties.description: Whether to configure managed channel beans.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.channels
properties.description: Map of named gRPC channel definitions.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.channels.*.host
properties.description: gRPC channel host.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.channels.*.port
properties.description: gRPC channel port.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.channels.*.retry-attempts
properties.description: Number of retry attempts for the channel.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.channels.*.plaintext
properties.description: Use plaintext (no TLS) for the channel.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.clients
properties.description: Map of named gRPC client stub configurations.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.clients.*.enabled
properties.description: Whether this gRPC client is enabled.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.grpc.consumer.clients.*.deadline
properties.description: Call deadline for this client.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.security.crypto.key
properties.description: Encryption key for crypto operations. Must be set via external configuration.

deprecation.reason: This property must be changed from the default value for security reasons.

properties.name: box.libs.utilities.security.token.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token signing. Must be set via external configuration.

deprecation.reason: This property must be changed from the default value for security reasons.

values.description: Default placeholder value - must be changed.
Default placeholder value - must be changed.
